en.title: Master of Applied Computing – Artificial Intelligence Stream
en.text: Graduate program focused on Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and advanced computing, with a strong emphasis on building intelligent, scalable, and real-world AI solutions through applied learning and project-based coursework.
list: Core Focus: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Computational problem-solving
Advanced Topics: Applied Artificial Intelligence, Advanced Computing Concepts, Advance Software Engineering Topics
Technical Stack: Python, Java, C++, SQL, machine learning frameworks, LangChain, and data visualization tools
Applied Learning: Hands-on projects in AI/ML, NLP-based systems, predictive modeling, and intelligent applications
Professional Skills: Analytical thinking, problem-solving, teamwork, technical communication, and presentation skills

en.title: Bachelor of Technology (B. Tech.) in Computer Science and Engineering
en.institution: Drs. Kiran and Pallavi Patel Global University (KPGU)
en.text: Undergraduate program in computer science emphasizing programming, databases, software engineering, and data-driven systems development.
list: GPA: 3.53/4 (First Class with Distinction) – Bachelor’s degree
Core Coursework: Artifical Intelligence, Machine learning, Deep learning, Algorithms & data structures, and DBMS
Programming Languages: Python, C/C++, Java, SQL, and web development fundamentals
Foundational Skills: Data analysis, project management, professional communication, and cloud computing basics
Capstone & Applied Projects: Machine learning systems, Web-based applications, and Data analysis tools
